snippet: The director of "Silver Linings Playbook" is expected to help promote a bipartisan measure to broaden access to mental health care, especially as veterans return from war.
abstract: The director of "Silver Linings Playbook" is expected to help promote a bipartisan measure to broaden access to mental health care, especially as veterans return from war.

headline.main: Eyes on Gun Violence, Lawmakers Propose Expanded Mental Health Access
